ques: Let's consider a hypothetical ________ to explore different outcomes.
You should ________ your pets to the designated area.
Please ________ talking while the presentation is in progress.
A neutral party was brought in to ________ the dispute.
The chef continues to ________ her culinary skills.
This parking space is only ________; you can't park here overnight.
Certain risks are ________ in extreme sports.
The teacher used an ________ to explain the complex concept.
The schedules of the two meetings will ________ for an hour.
The funhouse mirrors ________ your reflection.
The discomfort from the surgery is only ________.
The process of scientific inquiry constantly ________.
The counselor will help ________ the family conflicts.
The emergency ________ was well-prepared for various situations.
The responsibilities of the two teams ________ in some areas.
It's important to ________ potentially hazardous materials.
The artist intentionally ________ reality in her paintings.
Drawing an ________ between the two situations can help us understand.
The rain is expected to ________ by this evening.
The right to freedom of speech is an ________ human right.
They are in a ________ living situation until they find a permanent home.
The company decided to ________ production of the outdated model.
They decided to ________ the negotiations between the two parties.
Every job has its ________ challenges and responsibilities.
We should ________ our approach to problem-solving.
Some media outlets tend to ________ the facts for sensationalism.
The doctor advised him to ________ his physical activity.
An ________ can simplify understanding by comparing two things.
There is an ________ between their interests and hobbies.
In a worst-case ________, what actions should we take?
It's important not to ________ the truth when reporting news.
The team discussed various ________ for the project's success.
The authorities had to ________ the infected individuals.
She has experience in ________ conflicts and finding solutions.
The work of the two departments often ________.
She made an interesting ________ between music and mathematics.
They agreed to ________ hostilities and work towards peace.
The job is ________, lasting for just a few weeks.
The company aims to ________ its product design.
Creativity is ________ in the nature of artists.
The noise finally ________ after hours of construction work.
The circles ________ at the center of the diagram.
Using an ________ can make abstract ideas more concrete.
The heat caused the plastic to ________ and lose its shape.
The teacher will ________ the discussion between students.
The store is closed for ________ renovations.
The movie's ________ involves an alien invasion.
Some qualities are ________ in a person's character.
The fire department worked quickly to ________ the fire.
Education helps ________ one's knowledge and abilities.
